summary: In this context, 2-methylbuta-1,3-diene and isoprene are both mentioned as volatile organic compounds (VOCs) relevant to atmospheric chemistry. While isoprene is specifically discussed in relation to its emissions and seasonal variations, 2-methylbuta-1,3-diene is implied as a related compound in the context of VOC emissions.
